choices: Show me some more kicks Master
My palms need cleaning as well
Go clean my shoes and socks
Get under my desk, prepare to be my footstool
1.content:
You were tired of feeling weak and afraid. Plenty of nights, you'd watch action films where the hero defeats all the bad guys and comes out on top. Things were pretty rough for you since recently more and more people have been messing with you since you're an easy target.

You were browsing through instagram and came across an account of a taekwondo master offering lessons at their dojo. You figured this would be a solid start, since this would condition and strengthen your body for any scenario.

You dm the instructor Melissa and she replies to come in whenever you have free time.

Around 4pm, right after your classes, you hop on your bike, load in the address and make the first change to a better life.

Entering the dojo, it was rather simple, a few matts and some punching dummies. No one was around so you call out seeing if anyone was there.

Out walks a beautiful tall blonde woman who introduces herself as Melissa. Her pale skin and blue eyes contrast the black gi she had on.

"Hey there mister, what brings you in? Wait you look familiar, you're the fella that dm'ed me"

You nod and say thats me. She shoots you a smile and you mildly blush from how hot she is.

She runs you through the typical gauntlet of why youre here, what got you into this, and what you hope to get out of it.

She nods and smiles and tells you to follow her to the office to fill out the paper work. As you trail behind her tall frame, you look down to see this beautiful soles that have a thing layer of dirt to them.

"Hey I gotta prep all the paperwork, go grab a snack or water or whatever and I'll call you in when Im ready"

You scurry off to the vending machine and grab a bag of cookies. You look around the dojo some more and see a mountain of golden trophies and pictures of Melissa with many black belts.

You hear a whistle and she calls you into her office.

Walking into the office, Melissa has her feet propped up onto the desk. She was rubbing her soles against each other--- and interlocking her toes. You didn't know why but this was exciting you. She saw you were like a deer in headlights and pointed at the chair with her toes.

You realize what you've done and sit down. Her soles still remained on the desk continuing to distract you. Melissa was starting to take notice of the control her feet had on you but wanted to clear all the paperwork before she experimented more.

The paperwork is all done and she asks when you're free to start learning. You say now works for you since nothing else was going on.

She pulled out a white gi and white belt from a trunk in storage and told you to change into it. You excitedly changed and went to the main area ready for her lesson.

"Hey looks pretty good! Okay come here, lets warm up a little then I'll show you some kicks you'll learn"

You and her stretch and jump around loosening all the muscles. 5 mins pass and you're good to go.

Melissa demonstrates a standard stance for when you throw a punch and she asks you to do the same. You execute it well and she asks you to hold position.

"Okay so I'm going to show you some kicks you'd typically learn... dont be frightened if they come close, it shouldn't hurt" Melissa calmly tells you.

She reaches out and grabs hold of your wrist. Melissa chambers a side kick and you see it slowly extend towards your face. Thinking she would only hold it in front of your face, it caught you off guard when the blade of her foot made contact on your nose and mouth. She held it there for more than you expected but she just looked straight into your eyes and she had control over you.

This woman, who you just meet relatively recently, had her dirty feet on your face and you didn't know how to feel. Your words came out mumbled as your mouth was enveloped by her sole.

"Now I see the look on your face mkay, its a clear mix of pleasure and fear. I could release you and try some other kicks, or you can plant some kisses on my feet saying thank you for the opportunity master. Whats your pick boy"

As you were thinking about it in your head, she started to twist her sole into your face making you turned on.
1.title: Meeting the Dojo Master

12.content:
"KIYAH, HA" Melissa shouts as her feet pulverize your face. Her front kick smashes your nose and her side kicks attack your throat.

Her shouts turned you on like crazy and her feet continued to slap you around.

Melissa does a combo, kicking your leg so that you lose balance. You wobble around when she back kicks you into the wall. The impact knocks the wind out of you and she chambers a side kick. You know whats coming and as you brace for the attack, you don't feel anything except the breeze of her kick. Melissa has her foot centimeters away from your face. You see every wrinkle and crease on her sole.

She leans forward slightly and her sole rests on your mouth.

You ask your master for mercy but it comes out all muffled from her foot. She puts her foot where your nose is so that your mouth can be understood.

"So you want me to show you mercy young student... hahaha you're a funny kid. Hope you like my toes, get in my office and hide under the table, you have a job to do". She slaps you with her foot in the direction to the office and you head to your new spot.

Under the table you went, in a hunched over criss cross apple sauce position, patiently waiting for your masters feet.

You hear her feet flop against the mats then the hardwood floor. It gave you tingles hearing her mighty feet approach your feeble body.

Melissa's legs are visible now and she sits back into her chair, crossing one leg over the other. Her foot sways in front of your face... she flexes her toes, teasing you where your nose will soon be.
12.title: More kicks Master!!

info.brief_description: You're an incoming white belt, your instructor Melissa gives you a lesson.
info.description:
Melissa is tall (5'10) black belt in Taekwondo. You are an incoming student at her dojo.

-Try to write in the second person
-Use detail to describe how she dominates you
-focus on kicks or feet primarily but it can break off into other interests
-Try to add quotes to spice up scenario
-You will be smaller and weaker than her, she is better than you
-You are on the younger side, either high schooler or college kid
